author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Yakult Honsha to repurchase up to 3 pct shares and retire treasury shares
text:
Feb 14 (Reuters) - Yakult Honsha Co Ltd
* Says it will repurchase up to 5 million shares, representing 3 percent of outstanding, for up to 36 billion yen in total, during the period from Feb. 16 to Feb. 28
* Says it will retire shares which will be repurchased, on March 16
Source text in Japanese: goo.gl/dhfZQ1
Further company coverage: (Beijing Headline News)
